statements: UPDATE drone_telemetry_data SET altitude = 2000 WHERE telemetry_id = '07b53a39-d354-4a8f-bc82-7f6792add862';
UPDATE drone_telemetry_data SET speed = 50, battery_level = 80 WHERE drone_id = '70bc41a5-6e41-44d9-b29c-295006c5c0bf';
UPDATE drone_telemetry_data SET altitude = 1000, speed = 50.5 WHERE telemetry_id = 'd7f10701-991f-4c5c-bf9e-384a3646e946';
UPDATE drone_telemetry_data SET latitude = -33.8679, longitude = 151.2073, battery_level = 80 WHERE drone_id = '00127a7d-0368-423b-9287-a3cb08f94e75';
UPDATE drones SET telemetry_data = '{"status": "active", "battery": 95}' WHERE id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE flight_logs SET flight_duration = INTERVAL '2 hours 30 minutes' WHERE log_id = '8cbedfe6-a85b-4ec7-baae-329cc7b1e2e1';
UPDATE drones SET telemetry_data = '{"battery": 80, "location": "Home", "speed": 25}' WHERE drone_id = 12345;
UPDATE flight_logs SET flight_duration = '2 hours 30 minutes', flight_path = ST_GeomFromText('LINESTRING(-122.33 47.59, -122.27 47.60)') WHERE drone_id = 54321;
UPDATE drones SET max_speed = 50, battery_life = 120 WHERE drone_id = 1;
UPDATE telemetry_data SET altitude = 100.5, battery_level = 80 WHERE drone_id = 2;
UPDATE drones SET manufacturer='DJI', model='Phantom 4', max_speed=30.5, battery_life=60 WHERE drone_id=1;
UPDATE telemetry_data SET altitude=150.2, speed=25.5, battery_level=70, timestamp='2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE telemetry_id=5;
UPDATE drones SET drone_name = 'Updated Drone ABC', max_speed = 25.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE flight_logs SET distance_covered = 150.75, average_speed = 30.5, end_timestamp = '2023-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE drone_id = 3;
UPDATE drones SET max_speed = 40.5, status = 'Active' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE flight_logs SET distance_covered = 750.25, average_speed = 35.6 WHERE drone_id = 2;
UPDATE drones SET manufacturer='New Manufacturer', max_speed=30.5 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_type='Inspection', maintenance_description='Routine checkup' WHERE record_id=3;
UPDATE drones SET max_speed = 30.5, max_altitude = 500 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE telemetry_data SET latitude = 37.7749, longitude = -122.4194, altitude = 1000 WHERE drone_id = 2002;
